story.title: New But Experienced
story.text1: As Penta Organization, we are like a newborn brand. However, our team's strength comes from over 10 years of individual experience accumulated in the industry. Each of us has been part of the biggest events in the event world, and we've united these experiences under the Penta umbrella.
story.text2: Our team members have managed countless complexities and solved thousands of details throughout their ten-year careers. From this rich experience, we've created our own philosophy of peace.
story.text3: We don't see ourselves as just an organization company; we are your solution partner who transforms your vision into perfect reality, your trusted friend who stands by you in the most critical moments.

faq.title: Common Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most frequently asked questions

items.question: Is there a minimum event size to use your services?
items.answer: No, we serve events of all sizes. From a small meeting to a large festival, every project is important to us.

items.question: How far in advance should I contact you before the event?
items.answer: Ideally, we recommend contacting us 2-4 weeks before the event. However, we do our best for urgent requests as well.

items.question: How is pricing determined?
items.answer: Our pricing is determined based on factors such as event type, duration, number of personnel, and technical requirements. Fill out the form or call us for a custom quote.

items.question: Do you provide services outside of Antalya?
items.answer: Yes, we provide services throughout Turkey and abroad. Share your location details and we can offer you custom solutions.
